title: Flag Identification
description: Can you identify countries by their flag descriptions?

questions.question: Which country has a flag with a red circle on a white background?
questions.explanation: Japan's flag, known as the Nisshoki or Hinomaru, features a red circle representing the sun on a white background.

questions.question: Which country's flag features a maple leaf?
questions.explanation: Canada's flag features a red maple leaf on a white square between two red vertical stripes. It was adopted in 1965.

questions.question: Which country has horizontal stripes of black, red, and gold (top to bottom)?
questions.explanation: Germany's flag features three horizontal stripes of black, red, and gold from top to bottom, adopted after World War II.

questions.question: Which country's flag consists of a green background with a white crescent and star?
questions.explanation: Pakistan's flag features a green background with a white crescent moon and five-pointed star, plus a white vertical stripe on the left.

questions.question: Which country's flag has a Union Jack in the top-left corner and stars representing the Southern Cross?
questions.explanation: Australia's flag features the Union Jack, the Commonwealth Star, and the Southern Cross constellation. New Zealand's flag also has a Union Jack and Southern Cross, but with only four red stars.

questions.question: Which country has a flag with vertical stripes of green, white, and orange?
questions.explanation: Ireland's flag features vertical stripes of green, white, and orange from left to right. Italy's flag has green, white, and red stripes.

questions.question: Which country's flag features a blue Star of David on a white background between two horizontal blue stripes?
questions.explanation: Israel's flag features a blue Star of David (Magen David) centered on a white field between two horizontal blue stripes.

questions.question: Which country's flag is the only national flag that is not rectangular or square?
questions.explanation: Nepal's flag is the only national flag in the world that is not rectangular or square. It consists of two stacked triangles.

questions.question: Which country's flag features a red background with a yellow star in the center?
questions.explanation: Vietnam's flag features a large yellow five-pointed star on a red background. China's flag has one large star and four smaller stars.

questions.question: Which Scandinavian country has a flag with a red background and a blue cross outlined in white?
questions.explanation: Norway's flag features a red background with a blue cross outlined in white. It was adopted in 1821.

questions.question: Which country's flag features a green and gold horizontal bicolor with a red disc containing a yellow map of the country?
questions.explanation: Cambodia's flag features blue and red horizontal stripes with a white depiction of Angkor Wat in the center. Note: the flag with a red disc and yellow map is actually not Cambodia â€” Cambodia features Angkor Wat.

questions.question: Which country's flag features a cedar tree on a white band between two red horizontal stripes?
questions.explanation: Lebanon's flag features a green cedar tree on a white band between two red horizontal stripes. The cedar is an ancient symbol of Lebanon.

questions.question: Which country's flag is solid green with no other symbols or colors?
questions.explanation: Libya's flag was solid green from 1977 to 2011 under Gaddafi, but after the revolution it was changed. No current national flag is solid green with no other markings.

questions.question: Which country's flag features a trident-headed staff called a trishula?
questions.explanation: Barbados' flag features a broken trident (trishula) in black on a gold and blue background. The trident symbolizes independence from colonial rule.

questions.question: Which African country's flag features a green background with a yellow diamond containing a blue globe with 27 white stars?
questions.explanation: This is actually the flag of Brazil, not an African country. Brazil's flag features a green field, yellow diamond, and a blue globe with 27 stars and the motto 'Ordem e Progresso.'
